Topic Summary: Appeal against Value Added Taxation “VAT” and Corporation Tax “CT” assessments, including Surcharges
Tax Legislation: Section 886 Taxes Consolidation Act, 1997 ("TCA 1997"), section 1084 TCA 1997, section 949E TCA 1997, section 959AD TCA 1997, section 84 Value-Added Tax Consolidation Act 2010 (“VATCA 2010”), section 111 VATCA 2010.
